name: Sonic SpeedRun X
description:
Here is a pretty simple sonic game made by me and my daughter..

I love Sonic… she loves sonic.

so lets make sonic!!!!

Sonic Runner fangame.
Collect rings and kill enemies in the classic sonic way. timing is everything.
Who will be the ultimate Ring collector.

#fangame #platformer #sonic #pixel #onebutton #adventure #retro
